originalText.text: I love working with Dogman Sachs!! They are my absolute go to when I find myself having a busy week without time to take my dog out. Was initially nervous about leaving my dog with someone I didn’t know, but they were super responsive, sending me cute pics of my dog on her walk, and the walkers are all super friendly!! Highly recommend!!!

text.text: I love working with Dogman Sachs!! They are my absolute go to when I find myself having a busy week without time to take my dog out. Was initially nervous about leaving my dog with someone I didn’t know, but they were super responsive, sending me cute pics of my dog on her walk, and the walkers are all super friendly!! Highly recommend!!!

originalText.text: After trying out 3-4 other dog walker companies, I was finally referred to Dogman Sachs. Noah was our walker and both of my girls loved him! He was patient and confident with my rescue pup who was a little nervous about the city. Communication was easy and fast. Pics sent every walk. Easy mode of payment. Highly recommend!

text.text: After trying out 3-4 other dog walker companies, I was finally referred to Dogman Sachs. Noah was our walker and both of my girls loved him! He was patient and confident with my rescue pup who was a little nervous about the city. Communication was easy and fast. Pics sent every walk. Easy mode of payment. Highly recommend!

originalText.text: I cannot say enough good things about Dogman Sachs. My boyfriend and I had just rescued our first puppy, Scooby, but we were working both full-time and hybrid office schedules, unsure how a puppy would fit into the mix. Our friends and neighbors, who had just started using Dogman Sachs, recommended them right away and they were a godsend! They took such good care of Scooby from 10 weeks old to almost 1 year. Camille and Diego are so caring, attentive, and quickly became good friends of ours. I always felt comfortable leaving Scooby for daycare while I was in the office as well as boarding him over countless weekends (we not so ideally had 8 weddings the summer we got Scooby). Camille and Diego also built such a great community among everyone who used Dogman Sachs. I gave a referral to someone I had never met who was hesitant about leaving his new dog with "strangers". He instantly felt the same way I did about Dogman Sachs and our dogs became best friends, who played together weekly. We used Dogman Sachs constantly and the price was unbeatable; however, my company then partnered with Rover so I was able to get dogcare for free (which I didn't take advantage of right away because I was devastated to part with Dogman Sachs). We moved from FiDi to Hoboken around the same time, and we have a great Rover walker who we love, but I still keep in touch with Camille and Diego and our dog Scooby adores their dog, Carnegie. I could go on and on, but Dogman Sachs is the BEST! Your pup will be in amazing hands.

originalText.text: I’ve used Dogman Sachs many times for boarding and found them to be just fantastic. I trust Camille and Diego completely and it’s obvious they really care about my dog. They are also excellent at communications and at sending pix my way. I can’t recommend them highly enough!

text.text: I’ve used Dogman Sachs many times for boarding and found them to be just fantastic. I trust Camille and Diego completely and it’s obvious they really care about my dog. They are also excellent at communications and at sending pix my way. I can’t recommend them highly enough!

originalText.text: I can’t say enough great things about Dogman Sachs! They are the most accommodating dog walking service with the best dog walkers. My dog loves every dog walker at Dogman sachs and I literally never have to worry about her during the day because I can fully trust that they are caring for her as if she is their own. This company has made having a dog and a demanding job possible and I’m so grateful. Highly recommend!
